thread.title: Office Envy: Brazen's Unapologetic Expansion

author: Eric Hal Schwartz
title: Office Envy: Brazen's Unapologetic Expansion
text:
share Brazen HQ 
Arlington-based startup Brazen is growing so fast that it is literally knocking down walls in its office to make room. The company has added dozens of new employees in the last year and is taking over more space on its office floor to accomadate them all. 
The $4.7 million funding round it closed in June ensures that hiring people to sell and support its software platform for real-time messaging and collaborations won't end any time soon. Brazen, which changed its name from Brazen Careerist at the same time the funding round closed, let me take a look around at the office as it prepares for its next phase. See Brazen's Open Spaces >> All the tech news in D.C. you need to know.
